title: Toshishita Osananajimi Wa Amaku Semetai Otoshigoro
alternative_title: 年下幼馴染はあまく責めたいオトシゴロ ; My Younger Childhood Friend Is at an Age Where He Wants to Pursue Sweetly
status: 年下幼馴染はあまく責めたいオトシゴロ ; My Younger Childhood Friend Is at an Age Where He Wants to Pursue Sweetly
description:
Description :
        Aoi Minato and Shiraishi Yuki are childhood friends that grew up together like brothers. A decade passes with Minato taking care of and spoiling Yuki...Now that they're in high school, he is suddenly pushed against the wall by Yuki."I've always been attracted to you in this way, Nii-chan."Freaking out at Yuki's sudden confession, he throws Yuki to the ground!!But without losing heart, Yuki continues making advances to Minato, using every trick in the book! How does Minato respond to this...?Funny, steamy, and lovey-dovey!A hyper love comedy between high-schoolers!!
